venue.name: Roots and Wings Yoga and Healing ArtsCenter

item.description:
Did you know that Ann co-sponsors a free community evening at Roots and Wings once a month? It’s their gift to you. Bring your family and friends! Here’s June’s event:


Better and Better!

  • Ever have not so good days?
  • Does life get you down sometimes?
  • Would you like some really simple techniques for feeling better and better?
  • How about a process for generating a new behavior – for getting better and better?

Once again, through a combination of instruction, guided meditations and guided inner processes, Ann will use her magic to guide you to your own magic, and your best self.


You’ll deeply connect to the greatness that’s already there, and also learn how to create an even better you for a future you desire. And, best of all, you’ll leave feeling really, really good! Everyone always does.

So treat yourself to this wonderful free event for you. Please invite others to sign up and join you. Share this with your friends, family and groups. The class is appropriate for everyone, and all are welcome!

“It was much more than I expected. It was a wonderful foundation for resolution to a conflict I’ve had for years. I feel free and lifted with the guidance I received tonight.” Cassandra

Space is limited, so registration is required.  Please plan on arriving around 7:05 to get settled.


“Overall, it was a wonderful experience! :-) It was great to connect with my inner self through the meditations as well as learn a new technique that allowed myself to be at peace (instead of stuck) with certain "struggles." Thank you!” Amy

Class leader: Ann Ide, M.A., www.newpossibilitiescoaching.com, certified master practitioner in Neuro-linguistic Programming and Hypnotherapy, and certified NLP Life Coach. Ann coaches people to move beyond struggles and mere survival, to new levels of harmony, happiness and success. With her expert questioning, inner exploration processes and personal change interventions, clients become emotionally and spiritually aligned to more easily create the happiness they want.

This event is co-sponsored by Roots and Wings and New Possibilities Coaching as a community service.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the Wings studio on the first floor

group.name: "Good Vibrations" Metro West Law of Attraction Community

item.name: Free community event: Better and Better!
